# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(geometry LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(geometry "")
set_target_properties(geometry PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "geometry")
set_target_properties(geometry PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
add_dependencies(geometry triangle)
target_compile_options(geometry PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(geometry PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(geometry PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(geometry PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET geometry PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(geometry PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/triangle/windows/x64/release/src/triangle/triangulate_polygon.cpp.obj
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/triangle/windows/x64/release/src/triangle/triangle.c.obj
)
target_sources(geometry PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)

# target
